info.description:
Product Offering Qualification API is one of Pre-Ordering Management API Family. Product Offering Qualification API goal is to provide Product Offering commercial eligibility. This API allows to 
•	request a specific productOffering eligibility
•	look for productOffering eligibles (ot not) from a product category
•	look for productOffering eligibles (or not) from a productspec description.
Because the API allows describing product from the inventory, it is also possible to use it to retrieve productOffering available to complete existing product.
info.title: API ProductOfferingQualification

ChannelRef.description: The channel defines the channel for selling product offerings.

ProductOfferingRef.description: A product offering represents entities that are orderable from the provider of the catalog, this resource includes pricing information.

id.description: Unique identifier of the product offering.

@referredType.description: Indicate the class (type) of product offering

ProductSpecificationRef.description: A ProductSpecification is a detailed description of a tangible or intangible object made available externally in the form of a ProductOffering to customers or other parties playing a party role.

id.description: Unique identifier of the product specification

ProductCharacteristic.description: Characteristics of the product to instantiate or to modify

@schemaLocation.description: This field provided a link to the schema describing this REST resource.

Place.description: Describe a place (using either geographicAddress or GeographicLocation) and/or identify an existing place (either an existing geographicAddress or existing GeographicLocation or existing GeographicSite) through its id.

id.description: Must be a geographicAddress id or GeographicLocation id or GeographicSite id

role.description: Role of the place - could be' installation place' for example

@schemaLocation.description: A link to the schema describing this REST resource.

QualificationItemRelationship.description: Used to describe link(s) to other items to the one qualified.

type.description: Type of relationship (ex: reliesOn, connectedTo, etc...).

id.description: Id of the ProductOfferingQualificationItem (from the same ProductOfferingQualificationItem).

CategoryRef.description: The category resource is used to group product offerings, service and resource candidates in logical containers. Categories can contain other categories and/or product offerings, resource or service candidates.

TerminationError.description: If the qualifcationItem has not been done properly we indicate there the termination error(s).

id.description: Unique identifier of the termination error

value.description: Text to describe the termination error (Unable to proceed to qualification because incomplete information provided).

RelatedPartyRef.description: A related party defines party or party role linked to a specific entity.

id.description: Unique identifier of a related party

href.description: Reference of the related party, could be a party reference or a party role reference.

@referredType.description: Indicates the base (class) type of the party.

EligibilityUnavailabilityReason.description: Reason for eligibility result if the productOfferingQualification result is no (meaning the productOffering or productSpec is not available).

@type.description: Indicates the (class) type of the unavailability reason

@schemaLocation.description: A link to the schema describing this REST resource

AlternateProductOfferingProposal.description: Alternate product Offering proposal is used when the requested product offering is not available with characteristic and date asked for. An alternate proposal could be a distinct product offering or product Spec close to requested one or same as requested but with a different activation date.

id.description: Identifier of a alternate product offering proposal.

alternateActivationDate.description: Alternate activation date in case seller is not able to meet requested expected activation date.

@type.description: Indicates the (class) type of alternate product offering proposal.

@schemaLocation.description: A link to the schema describing this REST resource

alternateProductSpecification.description: A ProductSpecification is a detailed description of a tangible or intangible object made available externally in the form of a ProductOffering to customers or other parties playing a party role.

alternateProductOffering.description: A product offering represents entities that are orderable from the provider of the catalog, this resource includes pricing information.

Product.description: Configure the product characteristics (only configurable characteristics and necessary only if a non default value is selected) and/or identify the product that needs to be modified/deleted.

ProductRelationship.description: Used to describe link(s) to product(s) to the one qualified.

type.description:
Type of the product relationship. It can be :

     - "bundled" if the product is a bundle and you want to describe the 'bundled' products inside this bundle
     -  'reliesOn' if the product needs another already owned product to rely on (e.g. an option on an already owned mobile access product)

'targets' or 'isTargete' (depending on the way of expressing the link) for any other kind of links that may be useful.

state.description: State of the productOfferingQualification item (acknowledged, inProgress, terminatedWithError, done).

expectedActivationDate.description: Date when the requester look for productOfferingQualification activation.

qualificationItemResult.description:
Qualification result for this productOfferingQualification item. It could be:

     -  qualified (request productOffering or productSpecification are available), 
     - unqualified (requested not available and not alternate available),
     - alternate (requested not available but proposal available)

@type.description: Indicates the (class) type of the productOfferingQualificationItem.

@schemaLocation.description: Link to schema describing this REST resource.

expectedActivationDate.description: Date when the requester look for productOfferingQualification activation.

@type.description: Indicates the (class) type of the productOfferingQualificationItem.

@schemaLocation.description: Link to schema describing this REST resource.

ProductOfferingQualification.description: ProductOfferingQualification is used to perform a commercial eligibility. It allows to retrieve a list of productOffering that are commercially available in the context of the interaction (defined be place, channel, party, product).

id.description: Unique identifier of the productOfferingQualification resource.

productOfferingQualificationDateTime.description: Date when the productOfferingQualification has been submitted.

state.description: State of the productOfferingQualification (acknowledged, inProgress, terminatedWithError, done).

qualificationResult.description:
Qualification result for this productOfferingQualification. It could be:
-  qualified (all qualification item are qualified), - alternate (At least one item alternate and no item with unqualified) ,
- unqualified (At least one item unqualified)

expectedQualificationDate.description: Deadline date when the requester expected a qualification answer.

estimatedResponseDate.description: Date when the requester expect to provide an answer for the qualification request.

provideAlternative.description: An indicator which when the value is "true" means that alternative solutions should be provided.

provideOnlyAvailable.description: An indicator which when the value is "true" means that only available product offering must be listed in the response.

provideUnavailabilityReason.description: An indicator which when the value is "true" means that unavailability reason are expected for non available product offering.

@baseType.description: Indicates the base type of the resource. Here can be 'ProductOfferingQualification'.

@type.description: Indicates the type of resource. Here can be 'ProductOfferingQualification'.

@schemaLocation.description: Link to schema describing this REST resource

expectedQualificationDate.description: Deadline date when the requester expected a qualification answer.

provideAlternative.description: An indicator which when the value is "true" means that alternative solutions should be provided.

provideOnlyAvailable.description: An indicator which when the value is "true" means that only available product offering must be listed in the response.

provideUnavailabilityReason.description: An indicator which when the value is "true" means that unavailability reason are expected for non available product offering.

@baseType.description: Indicates the base type of the resource. Here can be 'ProductOfferingQualification'.

@type.description: Indicates the type of resource. Here can be 'ProductOfferingQualification'.

@schemaLocation.description: Link to schema describing this REST resource

Hub.description: An HUB resource is used by client side to subscribe to POQ notification(s).

query.description: Used to specify notification type + additional parameters

callback.description: This is the URL where server side must POST event when notification is triggered
